categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Valor Under Fire Citation was both a Rebel and an Imperial decoration given to exceptional warships.

The Star Destroyer Avenger was given this decoration and it was part of the Engagements and Decorations list on its Commemorative Christening Plate. The Millennium Falcon was also given this decoration during its time with the Rebel Alliance, and it was likewise also part of the Engagements and Decorations list on its Commemorative Christening Plate.
